mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sorry that Robert Montgomery missed his passage to Virginia; sent letter from Mr. De Burg with Andre Limozin; Tippoo Saib's embassy arrived at Toulon and the Emperor has made attempts at peace with the Turks; great turmoil in France; some members of the military have been wounded at Grenoble but exaggeration about the event makes it difficult to discern the truth; give regards to the ladies.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Tipu Sultan, Fath ?Ali, Nawab of Mysore, 1753-1799
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1788 June 18, Paris, [France], to Robert Montgomery, [Havre, France].
